text: The Men's shot put event at the 2006 IAAF World Indoor Championships was held on March 10. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left" |- align="center" | width=200 bgcolor=gold|Gold||width=200 bgcolor=silver|Silver|| width=200 bgcolor=CC9966|Bronze |- |Reese Hoffa '''' |Joachim Olsen '''' |Pavel Sofin '''' |} Note: In 2013 it was revealed that Andrei Mikhnevich, the original silver medalist, tested positive for a prohibited substance at the 2005 World Championships. Since this was his second offense, he was given a lifetime ban and all his results from August 2005 on were annulled. ==Results== ===Qualification=== Qualifying perf. 20.30 (Q) or 8 best performers (q) advanced to the Final. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !
